name: Too Slow v0.5
description:
60 seconds. It is both a lot of time... and not a lot of time. You have 60 seconds to explore the world and to find the exit.  If you fail in anyway the game restarts. Can you make it to the exit fast enough? or will you be... too slow...

Very first build of my first public game. This is a minimum viable product. Very bare bones and not a lot of content. Please let me know what you think!!!
